name: Dayshift at Freddy's: Doggo Location improved
name_original: Dayshift at Freddy's: Doggo Location improved
description:
NOTE: This game is a work in progress. Demo version is available, but you'll have to wait a little longer for the full release. I hope I finish it till 2023.
Also, I'm not DirectDoggo, and this game is a fangame. Yes.
It's a fangame of a fangame of FNaF. Enjoy.

Almost 1 year after Jack and Dave made Freddy's Bakersfield location close down, A new location was opened. Freddy Fazbender's decided to bring the Idaho location (#45) back. Now, this is where the fun begins.

The yellow Phone Guy we met during DSaF 3 intro is here too!
Just another Phone person to hide a first degree murder from.

• Destroy a new Freddy's Location! Yay!

• If you don't like option 1 you can help Phoney run it!

• Play Breadbear!

• Fight off the health inspector!

• Fight Matt.

• Commit murder with your old purple friend!

• Survive 14 days of the dayshift!

• Get both money and tokens to buy exclusive stuff!

• Noclip through an elevator!

• And much more!

DirectDogman for DSaF
Scott Cawthon for FNaF
Freaky for some of the music

Everyone Doggo already ever thanked.

Kevin Macleod for music.

"Stock images belong to their respective owners."

What i used to make this game:

-RPG Maker MV for coding and putting the game together.

-Gimp for editing sprites and photos.

-MS Paint for some of the spritework.

-Audacity for stealing music and sounds.

-Blender for 3d renders.

-Voice Forge on Blue Stacks for "voice acting".

-Enigma Virtual Box and Resource Hacker for preparing the final exe.

Join the Discord Server here: https://discord.gg/fzhX3YRJ34
